result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

3:05 PM Court Commissioner: Tim Heckmann, Reporter: UNMONITORED DAR. Clerk: K Kittel.  Attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Frederick J. Goetz in court w/Hunter Stone Lovdokken. INCLUDES: 22CF244 and 22TR370. Court confirms address of DE. Court notes Information filed to the case. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands. Atty does not waive reading. NG to all counts.  Waives speedy trial. Traffic matter to trail.  Adjourned: 3:11 pm.

2:36 PM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: Yates. Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Connor Smith in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Alan Park King in court for Hunter Stone Lovdokken.  Attorney Frederick J. Goetz in court for Hunter Stone Lovdokken. Court calls cases 22CF244 and 22TR370. S/T Officer Radke. Officer Radke identifies DE. Atty Goetz objects as to foundation during testimony; objection sustained. Atty Goetz cross. 22TR370 addressed as to presence of license plate. Atty Smith re-direct, Atty Goetz rests. Officer Radke released. Atty Goetz requests only probable cause on count 2. Court denies request. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Arraignment 8/30/22 @ 10:00 a.m. DE confirms address. Adjourned: 2:53 p.m.
Arraignment scheduled for August 30, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Status conference on June 20, 2022 at 02:45 pm.

- Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

02:37 PM  CO: Vlack, Reporter: Gross, Clerk: Christianson. ADA: Brian Thomas Smestad, DF ATTY: Jeremiah James Harrelson, DF: Hunter Stone Lovdokken appeared. Includes 22CF244 and 22TR370. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Defendant doesn't qualify for PD- DE is to hire private counsel out of MN- Fredrick Getz. Bond argument. Court orders bond. 22TR370: Court enters NG plea and reserves on pre-plea rights. DE waives prelim time limits. Court sets STC. Adjourned  Status conference scheduled for June 20, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
